name: Space Inversion 2 HD
description:
Premium IPAD HD version specially designed for iPad with extra content not found in the standard and FREE versions.
Space Inversion is the highly rated arcade Invader style shooter and it's back with a vengeance!
Bigger and better than ever before and now featuring a new Arcade mode with regenerating aliens and power ups to even the odds. New bonus "Meteor Storm" and "Flying Saucer" rounds add yet more thrills and the chance to rack points up for extra lives.

There's also a Classic mode for those wanting a slower paced more traditional game.

"Space Invaders is pure addictive fun !"

"Very good. Better than the original from the 70,s !"
"One of the best arcade clone games!"
"great game...worth getting the expansion also.....great replay value....graphics,sound all there. Five stars for me !"
"Played this game many times and keep coming back to try to beat my score. Really good fun ."



Space Inversion 2 now features in lanscape widescreen mode (auto orientation supported) and offers 6 different controls systems including Tilt,Slide,Butons and Joystick configurations. Fire modes include manual, semi-auto and auto fire.

Game Center Leaderboards lets you complete for the best scores in the galaxy.
This iPad HD version provides full use of the extra screen space available as well as 8 additional backgrounds and 1 new music track.
